constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 109 (Wednesday, June 23, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. PRICE of North Carolina:
H.R. 4100.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1, Section 8, Clause 1, which states: ``The
Congress shall have Power To . . . provide for the common
Defence and general Welfare of the United States . . . ''
[Page H3083]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Committee on Education and Labor, and in addition to the Committee on Ways and Means, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

title: CORPS Act
